programme.desc: In the final act at the Circus Tavern, two of the finest players to have ever played the sport created a match for the ages, as Phil Taylor and Raymond van Barneveld met in the final. Ep 3.

programme.title: John Part's Journey 2001-08
programme.desc: Follow John Part's PDC World Darts Championship journey from 2001 to 2008, a timespan in which the Canadian laid claim to three glorious triumphs. Ep 4.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Leeds Utd v Aston Villa
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Leeds United face Aston Villa in the Sky Bet Championship, with the sides meeting in the league for the first time since 2004.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Huddersfield v Leeds
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, a West Yorkshire derby as Huddersfield Town play Leeds United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Sheff Weds v Newcastle
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Sheffield Wednesday take on Newcastle United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship, with both sides looking for promotion chances.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Fulham v Aston Villa
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. In this episode, Fulham looked to maintain their playoff hopes against Aston Villa in the Sky Bet Championship in April 2017.

programme.title: Best of The OpenZone 2023
programme.desc: A look at the best moments from The Open Zone at Royal Liverpool in 2023, with masterclasses and demonstrations from some of golf's finest players.

programme.title: Best of The Women's Openzone
programme.desc: Revisit the best of the Women's Open Zone at the 46th iteration of the tournament in East Lothian, Scotland - the scene of Ashleigh Buhai's victory at the final Major of the year.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Memories : Kaymer
programme.desc: Martin Kaymer shares his memories of playing at the famous 2012 Ryder Cup at Medinah. Kaymer was part of a European team that completed a remarkable final-day comeback to win the event.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Memories : Colsaerts
programme.desc: Nicolas Colsaerts shares his memories of playing at the historic 2012 Ryder Cup in Medinah, where the Belgian helped Europe make one of golf's great comebacks to take victory.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: N. Forest v Ipswich
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Nottingham Forest look to avoid relegation from the Sky Bet Championship as they face Ipswich Town in May 2017.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Brentford v Swindon
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. Here, Brentford face Swindon Town in May 2013 in the League 1 semi final at Griffin Park.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Bradford v Arsenal
programme.desc: A look at some of the greatest matches from English football. Here, League 2 side Bradford City take on Premier League giants Arsenal in the Football League Cup in December 2012.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Derby v Hull City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County and Hull City go head-to-head in a thrilling encounter back in 2017.

programme.title: US Open Women's Final
programme.desc: Amanda Anisimova, the home favourite, faces Aryna Sabalenka, the defending US Open champion, as the American competes in her second consecutive Grand Slam final. (06.09)

programme.title: US Open Men's Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz play out the next chapter in their rivalry as the reigning champion and the 2022 winner compete for the US Open crown in New York. (07.09)

programme.title: PL Retro: Bournemouth v Liverpool
programme.desc: Remember one of the Premier League's great games as Bournemouth host Liverpool at Vitality Stadium in December 2016. Down 3-1, the hosts would make a stunning comeback.

programme.title: The Rugby Champs: AUS v ARG
programme.desc: A fourth-round clash from the 2025 Rugby Championship between Australia and Argentina. An 86th-minute for the Wallabies broke Los Pumas hearts in a thrilling finish to the third-round test.

programme.title: The Rugby Champs: NZ v SA
programme.desc: New Zealand and South Africa collide during round four of the Rugby Championship. The All Blacks recorded their first win over the Springboks in two years with a 24-17 victory at Eden Park.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: The fourth round of the Kroger Queen City Championship presented by P&G, an LPGA Tour event staged at TPC River's Bend in Ohio. England's Charley Hull leads by one shot after three rounds.

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Aramco Houston Championship, as Golfcrest Country Club stages the mixed-format event for the first time.

programme.title: The Lions v Wallabies 1st Test
programme.desc: Five warm-up matches down, Andy Farrell's British and Irish Lions enter the opening Test of three against the Wallabies in Brisbane at Suncorp Stadium. (19.07)

programme.title: WTA Final: Guadalajara
programme.desc: At the Guadalajara Open final, American teenager Iva Jovic faces Colombia's new number one, Emiliana Arango. Who will take home their first WTA-level title? (14.09)

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: New Capt, New Rules: Captain Kerry Titheradge takes control of the 197-foot St David as he greets his crew - faces old and new - off the coast of Grenada.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: An Academic Crime and a More Romantic Taco Bell: Dr Sturgis is mad when Sheldon accuses him of plagiarism. Mary finds a 'girl trophy' for Missy's baseball show.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Couple Bruised Ribs and a Cereal Box Ghost Detector: When George Sr accidentally lands the school librarian in hospital, the Coopers have to nurse her.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Crazy Train: When Dede gets remarried, Manny convinces the family to take the train to the wedding. And Jay's ecstatic that Dede is moving on for good.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Peri's heartbroken when things don't go to plan. Dillon's still struggling with conflicting emotions. And when Donny returns home to grovel to Misbah, something alarming catches her eye...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Leela worries about Ste when he doesn't come home while Dillon jumps to conclusions. Jez plans a memorial for Sienna. And after a bumpy start, sparks begin to fly between two former lovers.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Mojito: Gordon Ramsay visits a Cuban café in Brooklyn, where owners Marcelo and Kata fight over everything, driving away customers with their high-volume bickering.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer Simpson, This Is Your Wife: Homer signs the family up for a wife swap show, but easy-going husband Charlie (Ricky Gervais) develops a crush on Marge...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kiss Kiss, Bang Bangalore: Mr Burns outsources the plant to India and puts Homer in charge of training the workforce. Patty and Selma kidnap a celebrity.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A House for Sale and Serious Woman Stuff: When the house next door goes up for sale, Sheldon takes it upon himself to find the perfect neighbours.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Baby Tooth and the Egyptian God of Knowledge: Dale and Meemaw go to the casino, and Georgie makes a big mistake when Dale leaves him in charge of the store.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Rothman Disintegration: Sheldon and Kripke argue over who should get Professor Rothman's vacant corner office. Amy buys Penny some art to celebrate their friendship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Werewolf Transformation: Sheldon's well-organised world is turned upside down when he learns that the barber who has cut his hair for years is ill in hospital.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Fifteen Percent: Mitchell seeks revenge when Jay introduces Cameron as just his 'friend'. Gloria gives Manny's date a makeover.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Moon Landing: Claire feels slightly inadequate when her old friend, Valerie (guest star Minnie Driver), visits and is nothing like Claire remembered.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Higgs Boson Observation: Amy is jealous when Sheldon hires an attractive female assistant, and Howard's return from space is delayed by a week.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Re-entry Minimization: Howard is disappointed when he doesn't receive a hero's welcome on his return from space. Will he ever get the recognition he deserves?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Holographic Excitation: The gang celebrate Halloween with a fancy dress party at Stuart's comic book shop, but Sheldon and Amy can't agree on which costumes to wear.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Extract Obliteration: Sheldon is thrilled when Stephen Hawking agrees to play against him in an online game. Penny signs up for a class at the community college.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Halloween IV: It's Halloween, so the squad follow precinct tradition and compete for the title of Ultimate Detective Slash Genius.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Lisa Exchange Cross Words: Lisa discovers that she has a knack for crosswords and enters a tournament. But Homer thinks he can make money by betting on her to lose.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mypods and Broomsticks: Homer suspects that Bart's new friend's Muslim family are terrorists. Meanwhile, Lisa becomes addicted to downloading songs on her new Mypod.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Love Spell Potential: When the girls' trip to Las Vegas falls through, the guys invite them to a Dungeons & Dragons night that changes Sheldon and Amy's relationship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bon Voyage Reaction: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity that will keep him out of the country for several months. Raj pushes the boundaries of his relationship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hofstadter Insufficiency: Sheldon and Penny bond while Leonard is away. Raj finds someone to share his heartache. Bernadette and Amy attract male attention at a conference.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Deception Verification: Leonard returns early from his research expedition as a surprise for Penny, but Sheldon becomes upset that he wasn't in on the secret.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grift of the Magi: After Bart breaks his coccyx and ends up using a wheelchair, Principal Skinner foolishly hires Fat Tony to build ramps at the school.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Little Big Mom: When Marge breaks her leg in a skiing accident, Lisa takes over running the Simpson household, and Homer and Bart end up moving to a leper colony in Hawaii.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: There's a shocking discovery in a missing person's case. Tom helps Tony to adapt to prison life. And a resident gets backed into a corner...

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Madeleine has a weakness for rugby fellas while Sophie says she often picks the wrong guy. Publican Branislav has been single for over a year and can't wait to start flirting.

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: First Dates

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Wettest Stories Ever Told: When the Simpsons' plans for a meal at The Frying Dutchman are ruined, they try to salvage the night by telling three tales of disaster at sea.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Weekend Vortex: Amy is upset when Sheldon breaks his promise to attend her aunt's birthday party in order to join the guys for a Star Wars video game marathon instead.

programme.desc: The Transporter Malfunction: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon some Star Trek memorabilia, but she is irked when they refuse to remove the toys from their packaging.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tony feels disheartened behind bars, but will the return of a familiar face help? Meanwhile, a secret becomes too heavy for one resident to hold.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: (2022) Dark Marvel superhero fantasy with Jared Leto and Matt Smith. A science genius turns himself and his mate into vampires. But his mate's a naughty one and must be neutralised.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: (2003) Action with Colin Farrell and Samuel L Jackson. A loose canon joins an elite force to escort a fugitive to chokey. But the baddie's put a reward out for help with his escape.

programme.title: Capernaum
programme.desc: (2018) Nadine Labaki's award-winning drama about a young boy of unknown age who is in prison for stabbing someone and who is suing his parents for neglect. In Arabic/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: The quiz show returns with a LumoTV special. Can the teams recognise characters from popular LumoTV shows? Can they work together well to win £1,000 for their chosen charity?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: (1951) Director Carol Reed's drama. A disgraced trader finds a new life in a secretive trading village. However, his own greed soon brings trouble. With Trevor Howard and Ralph Richardson.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: (1942) Swashbuckling adventure with Laird Cregar and Tyrone Power. Privateer Captain Henry Morgan tries to rid the Caribbean of pirates when he's made Governor of Jamaica. Bit rich.

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: (1965) William Whitney's brutal western. Two former Confederate rebels are offered their freedom if they can track, catch or even kill their former gang mates. Starring Audie Murphy.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: (2019) Heart-warming comedy based on the real-life story of the Cornish folk ensemble who took the UK charts by storm in 2010, starring Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton.

programme.title: Memory
programme.desc: (2022) Action with Liam Neeson as a septuagenarian hitman; Monica Bellucci as a villain who hires hitmen to hit him, and Guy Pearce as an FBI agent investigating it all.

programme.title: The Rhythm Section
programme.desc: (2020) Blake Lively and Jude Law star in Reed Morano's thriller from the producers of 007. A woman seeks vengeance on the people who killed her family.

programme.title: The Big Man
programme.desc: (1990) David Leland's drama starring Liam Neeson and Joanne Whalley. An unemployed miner and ex-con turns to bare-knuckle boxing to support his family. But his wife's not keen.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: (1961) Drama. Spencer Tracy stars as an unfairly unpopular priest living on a volcanic South Sea island which is about to erupt. With Kerwin Matthews, Frank Sinatra and Barbara Luna.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: (1948) Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: (1998) Historical drama. Cate Blanchett stars as Queen Elizabeth I in this multi-Bafta-award-winning exploration of the 16th-century monarch's early years. With Kathy Burke. Violent scenes.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: Meander
programme.desc: (2020) Claustrophobic crawlspace horror starring Gaia Weiss as a kidnap victim who must find her way out of an elaborately crafted maze, replete with a variety of life-ending traps.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: (1970) Multi-Oscar-winning, fact-based, Second World War drama starring George C Scott, who gives a vivid portrait of the famously straight-talking US commander General George Patton.

programme.title: Against the Wind
programme.desc: (1948) Spy thriller. Robert Beatty, Simone Signoret, Jack Warner and Gordon Jackson star as British-trained saboteurs sent to Second World War Belgium. But one of them is a traitor...

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (1957) Classic western with Glenn Ford and Van Heflin. The capture of a murderous stagecoach robber propels an impoverished local rancher on a perilous journey. Directed by Delmer Daves.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: (2011) The third movie in the sci-fi action franchise. The discovery of a spacecraft on the dark side of the moon sparks another battle between the Autobots and the Decepticons.

programme.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande
programme.desc: (2022) Drama starring Emma Thompson as a recently widowed, retired teacher who has a sexual bucket list she wants to get around to now that she has the time and, perhaps, even the energy.

programme.title: Babylon
programme.desc: (2022) Margot Robbie and Brad Pitt star in Damien Chazelle's opulently decadent, satirical look at Hollywood in the 1920s as it teeters between the silent the era and the 'talkies'.

programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: (1948) Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: (1998) Historical drama. Cate Blanchett stars as Queen Elizabeth I in this multi-Bafta-award-winning exploration of the 16th-century monarch's early years. With Kathy Burke. Violent scenes.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: Meander
programme.desc: (2020) Claustrophobic crawlspace horror starring Gaia Weiss as a kidnap victim who must find her way out of an elaborately crafted maze, replete with a variety of life-ending traps.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: (1970) Multi-Oscar-winning, fact-based, Second World War drama starring George C Scott, who gives a vivid portrait of the famously straight-talking US commander General George Patton.

programme.title: Against the Wind
programme.desc: (1948) Spy thriller. Robert Beatty, Simone Signoret, Jack Warner and Gordon Jackson star as British-trained saboteurs sent to Second World War Belgium. But one of them is a traitor...

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (1957) Classic western with Glenn Ford and Van Heflin. The capture of a murderous stagecoach robber propels an impoverished local rancher on a perilous journey. Directed by Delmer Daves.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: (2011) The third movie in the sci-fi action franchise. The discovery of a spacecraft on the dark side of the moon sparks another battle between the Autobots and the Decepticons.

programme.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande
programme.desc: (2022) Drama starring Emma Thompson as a recently widowed, retired teacher who has a sexual bucket list she wants to get around to now that she has the time and, perhaps, even the energy.

programme.title: Babylon
programme.desc: (2022) Margot Robbie and Brad Pitt star in Damien Chazelle's opulently decadent, satirical look at Hollywood in the 1920s as it teeters between the silent the era and the 'talkies'.
